MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting SY21 postcode area of  Welshpool affecting a number properties in Trewern and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:24PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed the fault has been caused by a damage pole.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:35PM on 26th April 2021.
